item.title: Korean Air plans to buy more than 100 Boeing aircraft
item.description: Korean Air has announced a $50 billion deal to buy more than 100 Boeing aircraft and obtain engine maintenance for 20 years

item.title: City's mass transit cuts foreshadow possible similar moves by other agencies
item.description: Commuters and students in Philadelphia say they're waking up earlier and scrambling to avoid being late as they navigate service reductions by the reg...

item.title: Brazil's government says it will buy some domestic products hit by Trump's tariffs
item.description: Brazil’s government says it will buy several domestic products that have been hit by the 50% higher U.S. tariffs on the country’s exports

item.title: Southwest Airlines' new policy will affect plus-size travelers. Here's how
item.description: Southwest Airlines will soon require plus-size travelers to pay for an extra seat in advance if they can't fit within the armrests of one seat

item.title: Asian shares track Wall Street's rally after Powell hints at rate cuts
item.description: Stocks are wavering on Wall Street after a big jump last week on hopes for interest rate cuts from the Federal Reserve
